name: Codeforces Checking
statement: Given a lowercase Latin character (letter), check if it appears in the string $$$\texttt{codeforces}$$$.
inputFormat: The first line of the input contains an integer $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \leq t \leq 26$$$) — the number of test cases. The only line of each test case contains a character $$$c$$$ — a single lowercase Latin character (letter).
outputFormat: For each test case, output " YES " (without quotes) if $$$c$$$ satisfies the condition, and " NO " (without quotes) otherwise. You can output the answer in any case (for example, the strings " yEs ", " yes ", " Yes " and " YES " will be recognized as a positive answer).

sampleTests.input:
10
a
b
c
d
e
f
g
h
i
j
sampleTests.output:
NO
NO
YES
YES
YES
YES
NO
NO
NO
NO
